headline: Why Analog Devices (ADI) Stock Is Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of manufacturer of analog chips Analog Devices (NASDAQ:ADI) fell 3.2% in the morning session after a weak profit forecast from rival analog chipmaker Texas Instruments (TXN) sent ripples across the semiconductor sector. Texas Instruments, a major player in the analog chip space, announced it expected third-quarter earnings to be below analyst consensus at the midpoint of its guidance range. The company's soft forecast immediately weighed on investor sentiment for the entire sector, draggi

headline: Why Texas Instruments (TXN) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of analog chip manufacturer Texas Instruments (NASDAQ:TXN) fell 12.3% in the afternoon session after it issued a weaker-than-expected forecast for the third quarter, sparking concerns about future demand for its chips.

raw.headline: Why Texas Instruments (TXN) Shares Are Sliding Today
raw.summary: Shares of analog chip manufacturer Texas Instruments (NASDAQ:TXN) fell 12.3% in the afternoon session after it issued a weaker-than-expected forecast for the third quarter, sparking concerns about future demand for its chips.

headline: Chip Stocks Are Weighing on the Nasdaq
summary: The Nasdaq Composite was hanging around breakeven on Wednesday during another broad stock market rally.  The Dow was up 214 points, or 0.5%.  Texas Instruments was a big drag on the chip sector, with a 12% drop.
